text: Ronald Manning2017 Brier Media Guide: Previous Rosters (born c. 1937) is a Canadian former curler. He was the second on the 1967 Brier Champion team, representing Ontario (skipped by Alf Phillips, Jr.). The team later went on to finish third at the World Championships of that year.Alfie Phillips had a good time on and off the ice: [FIN Edition] Neil MacCarl Toronto Star. Toronto Star [Toronto, Ont] 23 Feb 1987: D8. ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1930s births Category:Living people Category:Curlers from Ontario Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Ron Manning
